plot: A boy and a girl are sitting inside a decayed house. Will they go outside into the storm that already starts to tear down the building?
title: Der Eisenturm
plot_es: A boy and a girl are sitting inside a decayed house. Will they go outside into the storm that already starts to tear down the building?
plot_en: A boy and a girl are sitting inside a decayed house. Will they go outside into the storm that already starts to tear down the building?
